data.current_description: Create or update tags for the user and app that are represented by the given token.
data.summary_suggestion: Create or update user and app tags
data.description_suggestion: Creates or updates tags associated with a specific user and app identified by the provided token. Tags are used for grouping and categorizing apps within the Play Grouping system. This operation requires a valid, verified token. Returns the created or updated tags in the response.
data.reasoning: The operation lacks a summary entirely. The description is incomplete - it doesn't explain what tags are in this domain context, doesn't mention the verification requirement, and doesn't describe the response. Added domain context about tag purpose, clarified the verification prerequisite, and specified the return value for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'playgrouping.apps.tokens.verify' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. The operation lacks a summary. The description is comprehensive about the security purpose and prerequisite requirement, but lacks clarity on the response behavior - what happens on success vs. failure. Added a concise summary and clarified the response outcomes to improve AI agent interpretability regarding when this operation succeeds and what it enables.

data.current_description: Verify an API token by asserting the app and persona it belongs to. The verification is a protection against client-side attacks and will fail if the contents of the token don't match the provided values. A token must be verified before it can be used to manipulate user tags.
data.summary_suggestion: Verify API token for app and persona
data.description_suggestion: Verifies that an API token is valid and matches the specified app package and persona. This verification protects against client-side attacks by ensuring token contents correspond to the provided values. Verification is a prerequisite before using the token to create, update, or manipulate user tags. Returns a success response if verification passes, or fails with an error if token contents don't match the provided values.
data.reasoning: The operation lacks a summary. The description is comprehensive about the security purpose and prerequisite requirement, but lacks clarity on the response behavior - what happens on success vs. failure. Added a concise summary and clarified the response outcomes to improve AI agent interpretability regarding when this operation succeeds and what it enables.
